original_text:
Will they find delight in the Almighty?
    Will they call on God at all times?
korean_text: 그가 어찌 전능자를 기뻐하겠느냐 항상 하나님께 부르짖겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Will they find delight in the Almighty?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 전능하신 이에게서 기쁨을 찾을 것인가?

sentences.original_text: Will they call on God at all times?
